Metadata: TERMINATION OF LORAN-A: An evaluation of alternative policies

This research project analyze​d problems associated with the planned termination of Loran-A service and expansion of Loran-C service in U.S. coastal waters. Coast Guard implementation ​ of the project's recommendations will assist civilian users of Loran-A with orderly conversion to Loran-C, while keeping costs to the taxpayer reasonable. KW: Navigation.
